badge_description: The beer you're currently enjoying will do more than just satisfy your taste buds; it will help Californians recover from the worst wild fires in the state's history. Brewed by more than 1400 breweries around the country, all proceeds from these beers benefit Sierra Nevada's Camp Fire Relief Fund. You can learn more and make donations here.
badge_hint: Check-in to one (1) beer with the term ‘Resilience’ in the name between December 15th - March 1st.

badge_description: We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 5 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 2
badge_hint: Try 5 different IPA style beers.

items.badge_description: We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 5 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 2

badge_description: Porters and Stouts are rich with both history and flavor. Roasty, dark, and delicious, these two styles helped start it all. That’s 5 different beers with the style of Porter or Stout. Try 5 more to unlock Level 2.
badge_hint: Try some Stouts or Porters - 5 different ones of them to be exact.

items.badge_description: Porters and Stouts are rich with both history and flavor. Roasty, dark, and delicious, these two styles helped start it all. That’s 5 different beers with the style of Porter or Stout. Try 5 more to unlock Level 2.

badge_description: Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 5 different Pilsners. Try 5 more to unlock Level 2
badge_hint: Check in to 5 different Pilsners.

items.badge_description: Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 5 different Pilsners. Try 5 more to unlock Level 2

badge_description: Another year down! Cheers to 2019 and all the delicious beer adventures to come! What're you looking forward to trying most?
badge_hint: Check-in to any beer between 12/31/18 - 1/2/19 in your local timezone.

badge_description: Here's to a magical Christmas full of joy, cheer, and great beer. We wish you and yours a truly happy and wonderful brew-mas.
badge_hint: Check-in any beer between December 23 - 26, 2018 in your local timezone.

badge_description: Wishing you a happy and brew-filled Hanukkah. We hope you have a wonderful eight night of celebration with friends, family, and great beer!
badge_hint: Check-in any beer between 12/2/18 - 12/10/18 in your local timezone.

badge_description: With so much to be grateful for in the world of beer, it's time to crack open your favorite and give thanks. Cheers and happy Thanksgiving!
badge_hint: Check-in to any beer between November 22 - 25, 2018 in your Local Timezone.

badge_description: It’s been a long day and now it’s time for a reward. Crisp, tasty and refreshing, enjoy that delicious fruit beer! That's 5 different beers with the style of Fruit Beer or Sour - Fruited. Try 5 more for Level 2.
badge_hint: Check-in 5 different beers with the  style of Fruit Beer or Sour - Fruited.

items.badge_description: It’s been a long day and now it’s time for a reward. Crisp, tasty and refreshing, enjoy that delicious fruit beer! That's 5 different beers with the style of Fruit Beer or Sour - Fruited. Try 5 more for Level 2.

badge_description: You're exploring this great country the best way possible, one delicious beer at a time! That's one beer while in at least 5 states or countries.
badge_hint: You like to get around. No - that's a good thing! Try a beer in 5 states or countries.

items.badge_description: You're exploring this great country the best way possible, one delicious beer at a time! That's one beer while in at least 5 states or countries.

badge_description: Raise a toast and give thanks to all who have bravely served around the world, past and present. Here's to you!
badge_hint: Check-in any beer from 11/9/18 to 11/12/18 in your local timezone.

badge_description: Sometimes you need a break from all the hops, fruits, and spices. What better way than with a crisp, smooth Blonde Ale or Golden Ale? Basic but delicious. That's 5 different beers with the style of Blonde Ale or Golden Ale. Try 5 more for Level 2!
badge_hint: Check-in to 5 different beers with the style of Blonde Ale or Golden Ale. Please note that badges are not retroactive, please review the start date to find out when this badge started.

items.badge_description: Sometimes you need a break from all the hops, fruits, and spices. What better way than with a crisp, smooth Blonde Ale or Golden Ale? Basic but delicious. That's 5 different beers with the style of Blonde Ale or Golden Ale. Try 5 more for Level 2!

badge_description: Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 10 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 3!
badge_hint: Check-in 5 times with the serving style of Can.

items.badge_description: Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 10 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 3!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 5 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 2!

badge_description: Cheers to eight years of checking in beers! Thank you for continuing to discover, sip, and share with us!
badge_hint: Check-in to any beer between October 19 - 22, 2018. Thanks for your support!

badge_description: You're getting the hang of it, but there’s much more to try. That’s over 50 unique brews!
badge_hint: Try lots of different brews!

badge_description: Beer is often better with friends. Besides, drinking socially is what we're all about! You've checked in with at least 10 other people within 5 hours.
badge_hint: Check-in to a location with at least 10 others within 5 hours.

badge_description: 99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 10 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 3!
badge_hint: Check-in 5 times adding the serving style of Bottle.

items.badge_description: 99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 10 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 3!
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 5 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 2!

badge_description: You have a keen taste for this Belgian masterpiece. Did you know the Saison style beer was invented by Belgian farms, brewed in the Winter and served the Spring/Summer to all their workers? Well now you do! That’s 5 different Saisons, Grisettes or Sour - Farmhouse Ale, try 5 more for Level 2.
badge_hint: Check in to 5 different Saisons, Grisettes or Sour - Farmhouse Ale.

items.badge_description: You have a keen taste for this Belgian masterpiece. Did you know the Saison style beer was invented by Belgian farms, brewed in the Winter and served the Spring/Summer to all their workers? Well now you do! That’s 5 different Saisons, Grisettes or Sour - Farmhouse Ale, try 5 more for Level 2.

badge_description: Drinking with friends is fun. Right? You've checked in with at least 4 other people within 2 hours.
badge_hint: Drink socially and at a venue.

badge_description: First brewed in the early 16th century, this peculiar flavored beer has made quite the come back. With a tart, salty combination, your taste buds are probably still tingling... and excited for more! That's 5 different beers with the style of Gose. Try 5 more for Level 2!
badge_hint: Check-in to 5 different beers with the style of Gose. Please note that badges are not retroactive, please review the start date to find out when this badge started.

items.badge_description: First brewed in the early 16th century, this peculiar flavored beer has made quite the come back. With a tart, salty combination, your taste buds are probably still tingling... and excited for more! That's 5 different beers with the style of Gose. Try 5 more for Level 2!

badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 11)
badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 12!
badge_hint: Check-in 1 beer from a list of small and independent U.S. craft breweries between 9/20/18 - 9/20/19. A full list can be found on our blog.

badge_description: Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 10 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 3!
badge_hint: Check-in a beer at 5 different venues categorized as a "Restaurant". This includes everything under the parent category of "Food".

items.badge_description: Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 10 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 3!

badge_description: Friends are gathered, steaks are sizzling on the grill, and you’re sipping a cold, crisp Guinness Blonde Lager. Here’s to keeping those summer vibes going all year long.
badge_hint: Check-in to one (1) Guinness Blonde Lager between 6/25/18 - 9/25/18.

badge_description: Right about now you’re feeling your face tighten and your taste buds explode. The full pucker is quickly setting in and you can’t get enough. This is the wonder of the sour. That's 10 different Sour Beers. Try 5 more for Level 3.
badge_hint: Check-in to 5 different sour beers. A sour beer on Untappd is any beer with a style of the following: American Wild Ale, Lambic or Sour.

badge_description: Looks like you're getting around. You've enjoyed at least 25 different beers!
badge_hint: Try lots of different brews!

badge_description: Instead of a spot of tea, why not enjoy a proper pint. That doesn’t mean you can't get all dressed up for it, so throw on your fanciest hat and enjoy that brew!
badge_hint: Try five (5) pints instead of tea between 4PM & 6PM within a calendar month in your local timezone.

badge_description: Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 15 different Pale Ales. Try 5 more for Level 4.
badge_hint: Check into 5 different Pale Ales (Imperial Pales, American Pale Ales, New Zealand Pale Ale).

badge_description: It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 10 check-ins with a photo.
badge_hint: Add a photo to your check-in 5 times. You must check-in to get this badge, adding a photo to an existing check-in counts, but you will need to check-in with a photo to unlock the badge.

That's a beer at 20 different venues categorized as a Brewery. Visit 5 more different ones for Level 5!
badge_hint: Check-in a beer at 5 different venues categorized as a Brewery.

badge_description: It's New Brew Thursday! Drink a new beer on three Thursdays in a 30 day period! Find out how New Brew Thursday was started, and catch up on old episodes.
badge_hint: Try something new for 3 Thursdays in a 30 day period. You can only level up once per 30 days.

badge_description: Let's raise a toast to America's Independence Day, a holiday full of friends, food, and great beer. Happy 4th of July!
badge_hint: Check-in any beer from an American (United States) brewery between July 3rd - July 5th. Collaborations do not count, unless the primary brewey is from the US.

badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 50 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 11!
badge_hint: Check-in to 5 different beers with a ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.

badge_hint: Check-in 5 times with the serving style of Draft.

badge_description: Supporting local breweries is what helps the craft beer scene grow. You obviously know this since you’re enjoying the local flavor! Be sure to always drink locally.
badge_hint: Drink 5 different beers brewed by the same brewery within a 35-mile radius of your current location within the last 60 days.

badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 40 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 9!
badge_hint: Check-in 5 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower.

badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 50 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 11!

badge_description: Enjoying a nice Night Out on the town? Thanks for taking untappd along.
badge_hint: Out with Untappd? Let us you know your location and we'll give you this badge! Check in with a location from 7pm to 4am in your local timezone.
